**Title: Repairs Heating Plants and Equipment - CFB Halifax**

**Reference Number: WS4621721790-Doc4622960562**

**Publication Date: 14 June 2024**

**Tender Closes:** 10 July 2024 at 14:00

**Selected Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** The Government of Canada has incorporated various international agreements into the procurement process, including the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and others.

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Scope of Work**

The Work under this requirement comprises the furnishing of all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to perform inspections, servicing, calibration, and repairs of all instruments, recorders, drives, controls, monitoring equipment, alarm systems, and accessories as fitted in central heating plants, boiler rooms, equipment rooms, arena, and curling rink within various locations of CFB Halifax as specified herein.

**Contact Information**

Contact Dylon Leonard, Contracting Authority, at dylon.leonard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any technical or contractual questions.

**Notice URL**

Access the notice on [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20023787?extsite=MjAwMjM3ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20023787?extsite=MjAwMjM3ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Region of Opportunity**

The tender opportunity is available to all qualified suppliers in Canada.
